revised_title: Closure Relations of Invariant Manifolds in Nonlinear Vibrations
tldr: The authors study planar diffeomorphisms in nonlinear vibrations and derive six closure relations that relate the invariant manifolds of a hilltop saddle cycle to other invariant sets. These relations help in understanding the organization and behavior of nonlinear phenomena in these systems, such as multiple coexisting stable periodic solutions, period-doubling cascades, and homoclinic tangencies.
